article.headline: Mississippi St. 74, N. Carolina A&amp,T 58
article.story: STARKVILLE, Miss. -- Ravern Johnson scored 17 points to lead Mississippi State to a 74-58 victory over North Carolina A&T on Sunday. The Bulldogs (5-2) hit 15 3s and shot 25 of 56 from the field (44.6 percent), rebounding from Saturday night's 63-62 loss to East Tennessee State. The Bulldogs outrebounded the Aggies 45-37 and scored 16 points off of 13 North Carolina A&T turnovers. The Aggies (5-4) made only 23 of 65 shots (41 percent) and were 7 of 25 from beyond the arc (28 percent). Mississippi State led 41-21 at the half and dominated throughout, ending a two-game losing streak. Johnson was 6 of 14 in the game and 5 of 10 from beyond the arc. Riley Benock added a career-high 15 points on 5 of 7 shooting from beyond the arc and chipped in eight rebounds for the Bulldogs. Nic Simpson paced North Carolina A&T with 16 points and Thomas Coleman scored 14. Simpson was 6 of 17 from the field with two 3-pointers, and Coleman was 7 of 13. This is the second game in a four-game stretch for Mississippi State in as many days. Renardo Sidney and Dee Bost, two projected starters for the Bulldogs, did not play because of NCAA suspensions. Sidney is eligible to return Dec. 18 against Virginia Tech, and Bost will be eligible for the start of Southeastern Conference play in January. Both are expected to play in Wednesday's exhibition game against Alabama State in Jackson, Miss.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
